Type.Name: NotifyEventArgs

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NotifyEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the <link location="node:gtk-sharp/programming/threads">Gtk# Thread Programming</link> for details.

Docs.summary: Arguments of the GConf Notify event that was called due to a GConf key being added, removed or updated.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string key, object val) cil managed

Docs.summary: This constructor is called to initialize a NotifyEventArgs with the key/value that was updated, removed or added in GConf
This NotifyEventArgs property refers to the key which value modification, addition or removal cause the event to be raised.
Docs.value: a string for the key name

Docs.summary: This NotifyEventArgs property refers to the GConf Value from an entry which modification, addition or removal cause the event to be raised.
Docs.value: the object stored in the GConf which modification, removal or addition cause the event to be raised.
